name: Let me escape
description:
You wake up by your alarm going off... Today is a bit strange.. more strange that usual

You decide to watch a movie and come across a strange yet fun outlandish movie with a language you don't understand

Halfway through the movie you laugh but have a bit of a sidethought

You feel this might finally be your day to escape this empty shell of a home

But their is a slight problem.. You slowly realize that all the hourse doors are locked.. and you forgot where they are

So through the act of puzzlesolving, you'd find the keys and make your way outside

This game contains a lot of puzzles and is pretty tricky to figure out, so you better be prepared for a good challange

most things in the game is interactable and often you have to flip switches in a specific order and open and close fausets in order to unlock stuff

With that said

Hopefully you'll manage to escape

Btw..

Use the "F" key on your keyboard to interact with objects
